analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0xac4f2f204b38390b92d0540908447d5ed352799a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/22/0xac4f2f204b38390b92d0540908447d5ed352799a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_name' of NahmiiToken.setName (/unique_chucks/22/0xac4f2f204b38390b92d0540908447d5ed352799a.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_symbol' of NahmiiToken.setSymbol (/unique_chucks/22/0xac4f2f204b38390b92d0540908447d5ed352799a.sol) is not in mixedCase
